      • selectVoxels

        static void selectVoxels(PottsLocations location,
                         Location.Voxel center,
                         Cell.Region region,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Location.Voxel> voxels,
                         double n,
                         ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Selects voxels to assign based on distance from given center.
        Parameters:
        location - the location containing voxels to assign
        center - the center voxel
        region - the region to assign
        voxels - the list of available voxels to assign
        n - the target number of voxels to assign
        random - the seeded random number generator

      • separateVoxels

        Location separateVoxels(java.util.ArrayList<Location.Voxel> voxelsA,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Location.Voxel> voxelsB,
                        ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Separates the voxels in the list between this location and a new location.

        Regionged regions are re-assigned between the two splits.

        Overrides:
        separateVoxels in class PottsLocation
        Parameters:
        voxelsA - the list of voxels for this location
        voxelsB - the list of voxels for the split location
        random - the seeded random number generator
        Returns:
        a Location object with the split voxels
